class.name: SubProcess
class.description: This class grants acess to run and manage sub processes with more fine grained control compared to OS.execute().

method.name: get_data
method.description: Returns the data returned by the last [member poll] run.

method.name: get_exitcode
method.description: Returns the exit code of the process.

method.name: get_process_id
method.description: Returns the exit code of the running process, or 0.

method.name: is_process_running
method.description: Returns whether a subprocess is running.

method.name: poll
method.description: Reads from the running process's console output if applicable.

method.name: send_data
method.description: Pipe data to the running process.

method.name: send_signal
method.description: Send a signal to the runnign process.

method.name: start
method.description: Start a subprocess according to the properties. Will return ERR_BUSY if something is already running. If [member blocking] is true, and [member read_output] is also true, the output can be read from [member get_data()] after this method returns. If [member blocking] is false, and [member read_output] is true, the output can be read (usually line-by-line) from [member get_data()] after every [member poll()] calls.
